summary: This is a brief email from an individual to an unspecified recipient, expressing the hope that if Ghislaine Maxwell is convicted, the US government will strip her of her US citizenship. It reflects public sentiment and a call for additional legal consequences.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the email; the sender hopes she will be stripped of US citizenship if convicted of the abhorrent acts of which she is accused.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated July 11, 2020, concerning Ghislaine Maxwell.
The sender expresses hope that the US government will strip Maxwell of her US citizenship if she is convicted.
The email refers to Maxwell being accused of 'abhorrent acts'.
The sender's name and recipient are not provided in the extracted text.
